short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto click all 'Show' buttons on Twitter if seen on the site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When "Scrolling" lewds on X/Twitter. It adds a watermark on lewds. And the user needs to do an extra click to see it. This Extension auto click all 'show' buttons on X/Twitter.
